issue.title: [CF 458] Unit Name not working on Boss names
issue.body:

comments.body:
Looks like it is working just fine. I don't know what else to tell you other than to try it with the "Only while counting" option disabled.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I should expand and say that it works fine using a unit that isn't boss1. I don't have the chance to actually test on Ultraxion till Monday.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Did an LFR run on my shaman and this icon seems to be working as intended.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Having issue with this condition as well.

Unit Name -> "boss 1-5" -> "Buru the Gorger"
Unit Name -> "boss 1" -> "Buru the Gorger"
Unit Name -> "boss1" -> "Buru the Gorger"
Neither does work. :(

When I drop this condition the icon shows up as it should.
Could it be that AQ, being very old content, is somehow special? It also does not show the boss by the right edge of my screen, as it does with recent content raid bosses.

Trying to set it up for Garalon, but obviously it is easier to test it on a boss that won't 1-shot me. I went to AQ for testing after I failed to make it work in Garalon himself.

UPDATE: When I change the condition to:
Unit Name -> "target" -> "Buru the Gorger"
...and target Buru it works as well. I would prefer not to rely on what is my current target tho.

What am I doing wrong please?
